place.name: Maison de charme
place.description:
Bienvenue dans notre maison de charme! 

 The very quiet house (120 m²) offers up to 6 (or up to 9) people (no pets) space, except the bedrooms there is a living room with large fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen (including dishwasher, washing machine) and 1 bathroom with shower and 2 sinks (or 3), separate toilet (or even one in the hallway), access to the garden via the living room and kitchen. 

 Situated on the edge of the village below the imposing Caroux-ridge (1000 m) between the two gorges of Héric and Colombières with stunning views of the Orb valley, the house is the ideal starting point for light to heavy hiking through vineyards, chestnut forests and the heath-like level landscape . Whether swimming in natural rock pools offers the surrounding valleys, the lakes on the plateau or in the sea (35 km), cycling, horseback riding, canoeing / kayaking or golf, this wonderful area recreation and diversion. Wine lovers will bpsw. St. Chinian Faugères or at their expense, the sophisticated regional cuisine to be enjoyed in many places.

place.name: 55qm Loftwohnung
place.description:
Location Description: 
 It's located near the hill district. Restaurants and bars are nearby. 
 It is located above a garage in a quiet back yard and has the charm of an old 120jahre 
 Shed. 
 Facilities: 
 The Loftraum has 55 square meters, has a large open kitchen with a gas stove. A double bed, sofa, and an open bathroom area with sink and bathtub. The toilet is connected to the office below it 
 Inside: 
 A patio is available. This may also be grilled 
 Special features: 
 In the lower part of the building is a small industrial (furniture). Otherwise, the coach house is in a very peaceful and neighborly friendly location. 
 General Information 
 International guests are very welcome.

place.name: City Apartment Löningstraße
place.house_rules: Bei der Wohnung handelt es sich um ein Nichtraucher-Apartment. Das Rauchen ist nur auf der Loggia gestattet.
place.description:
The modern Non smoking apartment in a central position in early 2011 completely renovated and is now available for your city break or weekend getaway. 

 Maximum number of persons: 3 persons 
 Living area in m²: 32 m² 
 Number of rooms: 1 room apartment 
 Distance to city center: 0.6 km 
 Distance from airport: 6 km 
 Railway station: 0,3 km 
 Next supermarket 

 LOCATION 
 The apartment is just 300 meters from the main station in a side street between the station and the center and is located so centrally located, where all the sights can be reached on foot. The apartment is on the 5th Floor of a well-kept building with lift. 
 The downtown market square, the old town, are Bremen Arena, the convention center with all fairs, museums, theater and musicals to reach. The annually held Bremer free market and the famous Christmas market in Bremen smell from here formally. Also, the Weser stadium is easily reached by tram. 

 AMENITIES 
 The bright apartment has an entrance hall, living area, a small new kitchen, new bathroom and a small porch, smoking is allowed on. 
 The apartment was equipped with high-grade laminate and tiles. 

 In the living room is a seating area, dining area, a double bed (180x200m) and a wardrobe. A 86cm flat screen provides the TV entertainment (cable TV). A wireless connection is available in the apartment. Bed linen is provided. 
 A guest bed for a third person can be placed. 

 The kitchen has everything you need for cooking. Of course, coffee maker, kettle and toaster. Similarly, there is a microwave. 

 In the bathroom has a shower, toilet, wash basin and a towel radiator. Hair dryer and towels are provided. 

 In a laundry room can be used for a fee washing machine and dryer. 

 Bicycle storage is available. 

 OUTDOORS 
 The apartment is equipped with a small balcony. Parking is provided in the side streets. It is also possible to park in the garage for public higher 2,50 € to face every day. Alternatively, you can use a private underground parking space for 3,50 € per day. 

 SPECIAL 
 Bremerhaven can be reached in 45 minutes. There you will find the climate and the house Emigration Center. By boat you can reach from there the island of Helgoland. In the summer season from May to September there is a direct waterway link there. 
 A trip to Hamburg is not a problem with the metronome. The Central Station is just 80 minutes there. 

 GENERAL INFORMATION 
 Reservations will be accepted until 2 nights. If you want just one night, a cleaning fee of 25 € must be counted 

 be selected. 

 Check-in clock from 14:00, check-out until 11:00 clock. 

 The Central Station is about 300m to the apartment. 
 From the airport is by taxi about 5.5 kilometers or 15 minutes to the apartment. With the tram line 6 is about 20 minutes flat (station Hauptbahnhof).

place.name: La Tamayo Saira 1051
place.house_rules:
Las normas son sencillas:
Debes mantener la armonía con todos los habitantes de la casa. 
No hagas exceso de ruido cuando llegues o cuando salgas, procura subir despacio las escaleras. Mantén apagadas las luces que no vayas a utilizar, deja limpia la cocina cuando prepares tus alimentos. No ensucies las áreas comunes de la casa (pasillos, escaleras y baño). Si necesias algo extra debes preguntarme con anticipación para ayudarte mejor.
place.description:
Rent  two furnished rooms in a large two-story house built in the early 30's. Prime location (between 12 de Octubre Av. and  6 de Diciembre Av. ,  La Mariscal Neighborhood  (travel agencies, restaurants, recreation centers, etc.) near the Catholic University of Quito, Salesian University, UDLA, Supermaxi and the Ecovía station Manuela Cañizares .
 Services:
 kitchen (communal)
 wireless internet.
Ideal for students and foreign visitors who wish to stay a while in the capital city.

place.name: Houseboat on Amstel river
place.house_rules:
Food: we are vegetarian - do not stock meat or fish in the refrigerator.
Toilet: the boat has pumps to get dirty water to the sewer system onshore. do not throw anything in the toilet except anything that comes out of your body or small amounts of toilet paper.
Smoking: we are non-smokers - you can smoke outside on the deck, whatever burns.
Shoes: we ain't Japanese, but prefer if you take off you shoes indoor.
Pets: we have a cat - she is old, and can't deal with other pets, sorry. She is not allowed in the bedroom.
Heater: when it does cold, why not switch on the heater. and switch it off when you leave or go to bed
Key: I'll give you a key to the house and obviously, return it
Other folks: Do not bring in any other people unless we know upfront
Rules: we don't like rules. But at the same time it can help build stronger relationships - as we all come from different backgrounds.
place.description:
Beautiful houseboat/ship on the Amstel river, 15 minutes from city center by bike or public transport. Boat is located next to the Martin Luther King park - so it's really quiet as there are no other houses nearby (except for neighboring boats). In the summer you can swim in the Amstel, sit outside on the deck in a Fatboy or relax in a hammock.

Please note that I'm not offering the entire houseboat. It includes the depicted bedroom - and of course you can make use of the living room, bathroom, and the deck. I will be there as well ;-)

There is broadband internet (via wifi) and heating for the colder days. 

The ship is in sailing condition. If you want to go out on a day trip (at cost), please let me know well in advance, as I have to arrange staff.

Some notes:
1. Boats were built the move stuff, not people. Therefore the ceilings are not very high. If you are taller than 1.85m, you will not be able to stand up straight everywhere.
2. Google Streetview: these images were shot during the Parade street festival. This is a 2 weeks festival in August - which is great, fun, but noisy. For the rest of the year, the park is quiet and there are no fences or porta potties either.
3. I can't host more than 2 persons.

Hope to welcome you on board of this magical boat.

place.name: Central London Apartment, Zone 1 N1
place.house_rules:
Non-smoking, but smoking is allowed outside in the street or in one of the fun beer gardens 
in the area 

Consideration for neighbours during quiet hours after 23:00-08:00. You ought to receive the 
same courtesy from them during your stay 


You benefit from use of a courtesy UK mobile/cell phone. This is on a pay-as-you-go basis, 
and you are to top up balance to make calls. You can buy vouchers at most convenience 
stores. We have always provideD this service without any problems to date, but please note 
that the use of the courtesy mobile phone is subject to availability, and there is no 100% 
guarantee. 


Third party services disclaimer: we do our best to ensure selection of the best service 
providers for internet, tv, mobile phone etc, and maintain all equipment new and in good 
working order, but we cannot be held responsible for the reliability of these third party 
services at all times. They are all courtesy of the rental. We do have had an outstanding 
reliability track record to date. 


Rubbish collection from the street is daily, rubbish/trash is to be put outside after 5pm 


Pets are not allowed to stay or to visit the property. The tenant is responsible for any pets 
allowed to enter the property and any damage they might cause. 


The property is to be returned in clean condition (professional cleaning standard) and free 
from personal belongings, just as found upon arrival. Professional cleaning at check-in and 
check-out is pre-organised; all you have to do is agree a time directly with cleaners for 
checkout. This is included in the booking. Additional extra or regular cleaning for longer 
stays can be organised your convenience and cost will depend on condition. Rate: £13 per 
hour. Allow 4 hours for light cleaning, 8 hours for deep cleaning. You will find direct contact 
details for the cleaning company when you book, and also in the property, to make 
arrangements directly at your convenience. 

Lost keys: guests will be given two sets of keys, but in the very unlikely event of finding 
themselves locked out or lose both keys, we apply a charge of £90 for callout, during 
business hours 9-5, and £180 if after-hours. This includes both lost keys and lock out.
Disclaimer: 
The Angel area is extremely safe, and the building as well, these are general 
recommendations and a legal disclaimer. The owner(s) accept no responsibility for any 
claims from the Tenant(s) with respect to injury, damage, or loss. The tenants are to 
arrange their own contents insurance, or otherwise travel insurance. Any malfunctions or 
damages are to be reported immediately to the owner for remedial action. All effort is 
undertaken to ensure all functionalities of the property are fully operational. In case of 
malfunction, repair ought to be forthcoming, and for prolonged failure a refund or discount 
may apply, but the Owner disclaims any responsibility for any business losses arriving from 
loss of operation of any functionality in the property. E.g. internet, courtesy mobile phone 
etc.. The Tenant is responsible for using both locks on the property door when exiting, and 
the lock on the building's front/street door at all times.
place.description:
Recently refurbished apartment in Islington, Central London. A smart and beautifully decorated one bedroom, Victorian period apartment located in Barnesbury, Islington, for Short term letting. Zone 1, N1, very central with great transport links on your doorstep. Within close and easy reach to all of London's key attractions, 12 minute bus ride to both Oxford circus and Camden and only 5 min from Kings Cross. Very convenient and bright.

Smartly and professionally decorated the apartment is positioned over one floor of a converted Victorian house and maintains many period features such as sash windows, cast iron radiators, original marble fire surround and window shutters. The location is superb being just a ten minute walk from the vibrant and trendy Upper Street. The bedroom overlooks a well kept garden and is perfectly silent considering the apartments location. Very cool in the summer with back to front natural ventilation, and comfortably warm in the wintertime. 

Benefitting from both the relaxation and comfort of a home and the buzz of vibrant Upper Street, Angel and Kings Cross and Caledonian Road only moments away the apartment is set less than 15 minutes from the bustling West End, with an eclectic mix of bars, cafes, cinemas, theatres, clubs, supermarkets, and a vast array of designer shops close at hand. Homely, clean, spacious, modern and newly furnished your stay here will be one of luxury with the benefit of being in one of London's most desirable boroughs. This apartment is a typical London home and staying here will give you the experience of living like a traditional Londoner in the heart of the capital.

Oak flooring with great rugs for a comfortable stay, 32 inch digital plasma TV, cable TV service (freeview), DVD player, ipod or iphone speakers and docking station, fully furnished with extraordinary furniture, automatic central heating, fully fitted contemporary kitchen with fridge & freezer, washing machine, gas hob and oven, microwave, large corner L-shaped sofa in living room for additional guests (sofa bed sleeps 2 very comfortably). There is a double bed in the bedroom (sleeps 2 others), and extra bedding can be offered for people wanting to sleep separately. Bathroom with bath and shower, and storage throughout. Secure entry with intercom and renovated entrance and stairways to building. Internet, and a courtesy UK mobile phone are in the apartment ready for your use during your stay.

Transport is outside the doorstep. Caledonian Road Overground Station (Zone 1) is a 5-minute walk from the apartment and all frequent bus services are only 30 seconds away. Highbury and Islington National Rail and Underground (Victoria Line) Station is a ten-minute walk from the apartment through the tree-lined picturesque Islington neighbourhood of Barnsbury. St. Pancras Eurostar terminal to Paris and Brussels is less than a 15-minute walk from the apartment and buses connect frequently from close by. Many buses to the West End and other parts of London can be found just as close. 

The centre is only a few underground stops away, you could even walk there.

Close to all the amenities shops restaurants and bars of Caledonian Road and Upper Street and opposite the Barnesbury Library. There is also a Street Car nearby as well as cycle hire and bus stops. All the theatres and restaurants you could want, plus great shopping. 

This flat is managed by a professional landlord and his professional support team providing extraordinary preventative maintenance and outstanding customer care, attentive and always available, enhancing your holiday or stay. 

All maintenance is undertaken in record time with little disruption to the enjoyment of the property. The locality of the apartment is ideal as it Is positioned in the heart of N1 (North 1) making it easily accessible to most of the main attractions of London whilst being set in one of London’s most picturesque boroughs. Islington is famous for its nightlife, theatres and offers an impressive choice to rival the West End. The world famous Sadlers Well Dance Theatre can be reached on foot. Almeida, Union Chapel and O2 academy, live music at local pubs and bars, are just a sample of the incredible range on offer. Well known attractions in the area include the Dickens Museum, the London Canal Museum, Camden Passage antiques market, Chapel Market fruit & veg, Columbia Road flower market, Brick Lane, Broadway Market, Spitafields and Pettycoat Lane. The Emirates football stadium is within walking distance, or a quick bus ride away. The landlord can speak English, Portuguese and Spanish with you.

Family friendly too as the area offers the Geffrye Museum with a splendid kidzone the V&A Museum of Childhood, Highbury Fields, London Fields and Regents Park, not to mention Thornhill Square. Newington Green has a children’s cafe called ‘that place on the corner’, and lots of child friendly cafes on Caledonian Road and Upper Street - also perfect for shopping sprees. 

We use a transparent price policy, so the price given on this website is the total price (plus any fees the website may charge). This price is inclusive of all services in the apartment, even checkout cleaning. There is nothing else to pay, for up to 4 guests the price remains the same.
Please email if you want to book a viewing, book straight away, or have any questions.

place.name: Affordable Home in the Real Bali
place.house_rules:
Please review with Wayan when you arrive.  
If you break it, you pay for it!
place.description:
The Swallow Guesthouse has room for 6 people and offers two separate suites, the “Sunrise Suite” and the two bedroom “Sunset Suite” suitable for families, writer's, artists, biking or trekking groups or people who want a longer term place to create and relax in the peace and quiet of the "REAL" Bali.  Both are fully furnished with separate western style bathrooms with hot showers.  Internet is available.      
Guests can relax while watching the surrounding daily life in the rice fields and mountain views from various lounging areas and patios.  One of these lookouts is the tall Gazebo or “Bale” in Balinese.  It sits above the shared separated exterior kitchen which is fully equipped with cooking facilities but we recommend you to taste our traditional meals offered twice daily.  Another is the Lotus Pond terrace – a perfect area to read at night and watch the fireflies.
The  Swallow Guesthouse is designed with Balinese tradition in mind.  All the building, wood carving and furnishings are made by hand by local craftsmen.  Guests can feel the warmth and passion that has been given to make this dream home come true.  
Your Guest Service hosts Wayan and Putri,  truly enjoy sharing their unique culture and are eager to answer any questions.  Don’t be surprised if they dress you up in the traditional clothing and whisk you off to a temple ceremony or family feast.  It’s their pleasure to make your stay comfortable and stress-free.  
Wayan, a 15 year experienced English speaking tour guide and driver, can accommodate your needs and questions.  If you desire assistance in an island tour for pleasure or business, he can help you arrange the details.  Putri, his wife, is our Indonesian cook.  She creates very delicious dishes using fresh garden vegetables from our organic garden and local produce.  Reasonable prices for meals are offered.  If you want some lessons, don't hesitate to ask in exchange for some English practice.
Our location is 20 minutes NE by motorbike from Ubud in Pesalakan Pejeng.  There is a short paved walking or bike path that leads away from the main road.  Guests enjoy as it’s extremely peaceful and quiet.  The short walk brings you alongside the rice and water dyke allowing you to leave all your stresses behind.  
Sunu's Pension down the road has a pool that Swallow Guests can use for a minimum fee when unoccupied.  
There is a small village market and several local temples where you can meet the locals and enjoy their countless smiles. As a Hindu race, people are very giving and non-threatening to heighten their karma. They love showing you their culture and sharing the ongoing ceremonies.
Minimum rental is one week and monthly discounted rates are available.   A deposit of $50US for weekly rentals and $120 for monthly rentals is required to hold your booking.  Don’t worry, we are still affordable for the budget travelers!
“It’s perfect for me to study, better than I dreamed it would be.”  Luc from Madagascar France.  Aug&Sept 2009
